pois.name: Great Island
pois.description: The ancient name of the island was Oilean Ard na Neimheadh, the "High (or important) island of Neimheadh".

pois.name: Cape Clear Island
pois.description: Referred to as Cléire by locals, this island is the southernmost inhabited part of Ireland, maintaining a population of a 100. On Cléire, rub shoulders with the Gaeltacht community or dig into its rich ancient archeology

newPoi.name: Micks Island
newPoi.description: Referred to as Cléire by locals, this island is the southernmost inhabited part of Ireland, maintaining a population of a 100. On Cléire, rub shoulders with the Gaeltacht community or dig into its rich ancient archeology
